text: Itak, v istinnykh soobshcheniyakh, soderzhashchikhsya v predydushchikh ayatakh etoy sury, - voskhvaleniye Allakha, istoriya Musy i vesti o Dne voskreseniya. Allakh nisposlal Koran na arabskom yazyke, rassypav i povtoriv v nom ugrozy o nakazanii i o tom, kak oni osushchestvyatsya, chtoby nechestivtsy otkazalis' ot neveriya v istinu i chtoby Koran stal dlya nikh uveshchevaniyem i nazidaniyem
